messages.title: A Brighter, More Secure Future
messages.content: To find out more about why you should vote for Michael Ellis visit: www.michaelellis.co.uk

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Continuation of the campaign to win more funds and focus on local road repair.
Keeping tax low to encourage job creation and looking to reduce unemployment.
Ensuring record investment in schools and focusing on core GCSE subjects.
Building more homes and facilitating home ownership for up to 12,000 families.
Helping police in their efforts to cut bureaucracy and in efforts on front line policing.
Reducing council tax and tax for over 25,000 local people.

mentions.candidate: Michael Ellis is the only candidate who will deliver David Cameron's Conservative manifesto. Michael, his wife and son live in the heart of Northampton North.

issues.economy: Michael wants the best start in life and as you grow older, which includes securing your first job and creating new jobs.
issues.education: Conservatives have a plan for every state of life, which includes improving local schools.

housing.content: Conservatives have a plan for every state of life, which includes new, affordable homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: Michael is a barrister and now Member of Parliament for the last five years. He has 100% attendance record in the main Commons votes. Northampton needs a strong voice in Westminster and no one will work harder for Northampton North than Michael.

politicalExperience.achievements: 100% attendance record in the main Commons votes.

endorsements.endorsement: Michael is the only candidate who will deliver David Cameron's Conservative manifesto.

quotes.text: This General Election is the most important in our country around issues of the economy, immigration, our nation's future, jobs and healthcare.

images.caption: Michael Ellis and his work on local and national issues.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This free newspaper has not been paid for by public money. It has been printed and delivered at no expense to the taxpayer.
